item.description:
Monthly Atheist Brunch at The White Horse, last Sunday of every month.

Expect a very laid back, friendly community of disbelievers who are serious about their brunch. Catch up with existing friends or meet some new people. Make something useful of a Sunday you heathen!

This is a brunch meetup on a Sunday morning at The White Horse tavern. Expect plenty of room to spread out and converse while making the most of hot coffee and their brunch buffet.

If this meetup does fill up, have faith! Drop Winfield a line and you're welcome to stop by.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Winfield or the large group of tables off to the side.
item.name: Atheist Brunch
